import { useState , useEffect } from "react"; function AddDocument(){ const [titolo , setTitolo] = useState(''); const [documento , setDocumento] = useState(null); const token_access = localStorage.getItem('access'); const handleDocument =(e)=>{ setFile(e.target.file[0]); } const UploadDocument =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() const formData = new FormData() formData.append() fetch ( 'api/upload_file/', { method : 'POST', headers : { 'Content-Type' : 'application/json', 'Authorization': `Bearer ${token_access}`, }, body : JSON.stringify({}) } ) } return(
{/* Titolo Field */}
); } export default AddDocument;
